cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Homeland Security on March 2, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 6871, DHS Acquisition Reform Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 36 (Monday, February 28, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. LaTURNER:
H.R. 6871.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 which provides Congress the power to
lay and collect taxes, duties, imposts, and excises to pay
the debt and provide for the common defence and general
welfare of the United States.
[Page H1176]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

title: DHS Acquisition Reform Act
